FailedExecuteFile: Failed to execute the file content
Title: Title
Name: Name
LabelFormatDescription: Add test to the series name. Unique value is reqired when having two series with the same dynamic series field.
DynamicSeriesDescriptions: Generate a seperate graph per each field value
CategoriesDescription: Defines the X-Axis values. For date based charts, usually it is defined in the Action Date field
ScriptParametersDescription: The script can contain the aggregation parametes in the convention of 'params.'+parameter name.
ScriptParametersDescriptionExample: For example, to get an average of thr total sales per account, define:
ScriptParametersDescriptionExampleOne: script parameter in the sum of GrandTotal
ScriptParametersDescriptionExampleTwo: script parameter in the distinc count of account ID
DynamicFilterDescription: Define the fields which if changed by the user, will be added to the chart filter
